item.title: Help on commands
item.dc:creator: @MsnRocks MsnRocks
item.description:
@MsnRocks wrote:

Thanks, but i want to know what to actually type, not copy n paste from other commands. like if i wanted to mute a player can i just put:

String muteThatPlayer = command.substring(5)

idk the number i just put it…

Edit:

Oh ok, thanks anyways!

item.title: Help on commands
item.dc:creator: @MsnRocks MsnRocks
item.description:
@MsnRocks wrote:

well what im trying to do it mute and umute people by a command…

i know how to write the first and last parts but not the “beginning”. what i mean is this…

else if (command.startsWith("mute")) { try { CODE HERE CODE HERE CODE HERE CODE HERE } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Enter the name of the player you want to mute"); } }

else if (command.startsWith("unmute")) { try { CODE HERE CODE HERE CODE HERE CODE HERE } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Enter the name of the player you want to unmute"); } }

how would i go about typing that part.

starts kinda like this:

String ? = command.substring(?) int ? = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(?) client ? = (client) server.playerHandler.players[?]

the questions marks are what idk what to write there for each type of commands,

i want to mute people, teleblock them, stop them from moving…etc… but idk how to do that part, can anyone please help??

Read full topic
